Miss Marguerite Fleming
Radio Station KSLH
1517 S. Theresa Avenue
St. Louis, Missouri
Dear Marguerite:
Gradually picking up the odds and ends.
I have here a talk by Robert Herridge (Camera Three) on his philosophy
of television production. If I remember correctly, you had this re¬
corded because, it is of interest to all broadcasters. The talk,
^incidentally, is "raw” — not programmed. t'~->
How is this to be handled? A school committee offering for "in-
station” listening? All stations? Or programmed for broadcast?
Has it been released for broadcast? As soon as we know, we’ll get
it out accordingly.
Sincerely, ^
John Holt
Network Manager ^
